H0.text: Which 1962 ecological classic was written by Rachel Carson. The Sea Around Us

H1.text: Which 1962 ecological classic was written by Rachel Carson. The Edge of the Sea

H2.text: Which 1962 ecological classic was written by Rachel Carson. Lost Woods

H3.text: Which 1962 ecological classic was written by Rachel Carson. Slient spring

A4.text: Silent Spring is an environmental science book by Rachel Carson. Published on September 27, 1962, the book documented the environmental harm caused by the indiscriminate use of DDT, a pesticide used by soldiers during World War II.

A5.text: Silent Spring became a rallying point for the new social movement in the 1960s.
